meanings.definition: A decorative motif in the form of an S-shaped curve
meanings.sent1: The artist added an elegant ogeed design to the top of the building.
meanings.sent2: The gate was adorned with intricate ogeed patterns.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator mistakenly created an ogeed shape on the cake instead of a heart.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting flowed like a graceful ogeed, adding beauty to the page.
meanings.sent5: The garden gate featured a stunning ogeed that caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: To form or decorate with ogees
meanings.sent1: She carefully ogeed the edges of the table with delicate carvings.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman ogeed the wooden frame of the mirror with precision.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully ogeed the sandcastle with seashells and seaweed.
meanings.sent4: His words ogeed the story, adding a touch of magic to the tale.
meanings.sent5: The artist ogeed the mural with vibrant colors, bringing it to life.
